Question: Shenzhen Qualitronic Technology co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen KTC Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Cutting-Edge Smart Displays at CES 2024

- Features high-end flagship OLED monitors: G48P5S (48'' 4K 138Hz), G39S5 (39'' 3440*1440p 240Hz 800R curved), and H32S17 (32'' 2K 165Hz 1500R curved)
- Introduces A32Q8, a 32-inch smart monitor with TV-like features
- Presents the H90 projector with Netflix compatibility
- Unveils the flagship display, the Go-to Smart Screen A32Q7 PRO (32'' Mobile Smart Display)
- Showcases the future of smart displays for gaming, office, and entertainment at CES 2024 booth [22840]
